summary: "Magnetic Rose" is about what happens when a deep space corporate freighter is called upon to investigate a distress signal from what ought to be a derelict space station. The space station... See full summary »
cast: Shigeru Chiba|Ami Hasegawa|Masato Hirano|Tomoko Ishimura|Tsutomu Isobe|Makoto Ohba|Tetsuo Sakaguchi|Yôko Soumi|Gara Takashima|Kôichi Yamadera|Shôzô Îzuka
title: Kanojo no omoide
